overview: Jason Tober provides executive leadership and directs and manages Shavlikâ€™s global sales and business development initiatives. Jason has been in the information technology market for 16 years where he has held sales, management, and technical positions for Fortune 500 companies (e.g. CSC) as well as start-ups. Jason co-founded Ian Alliott Consulting, a technology and management consulting firm which was acquired by TechArch Group in 2000. Jason also co-founded Medovation, Inc. to develop automation software for the medical device market. Jason has been with Shavlik since 2004 serving in various North American and International sales and business development roles. Jason has a Bachelor of Arts degree in Biology from St. Olaf College.

relationships.title: Vice President, Sales and Business Development
